original_text: Jesus said to them, ‘It is one of you 12 apostles. That man is eating from the same dish as I am.
korean_text: 그들에게 이르시되 열둘 중의 하나 곧 나와 함께 그릇에 손을 넣는 자니라

sentences.original_text: It is one of you 12 apostles
That man is eating from the same dish
sentences.korean_translation: 그 사람은 같은 접시에서 먹고 있다
